content: This is a valuable lesson for every creative soul out there. At first, we all crave the fame and recognition that comes with big AAA works (not video-games in particular). It is all part of the desire that drives our being: the desire to be someone, do something important, be known. But we fail to visualize these desires in a form that will actually matter: the desire to be someone to myself, to do something important for myself, to be known for something I created.
